snippet: A diverse group is trying to forestall dating violence by addressing middle schoolers to educate them about relationships before they start dating in earnest.
abstract: Diverse coalition that includes the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation and federal lawmakers is trying to forestall the high rate of physical and sexual abuse among women ages 16 to 24 by educating middle school students about relationships before they begin dating in earnest.
lead_paragraph: A diverse group is trying to forestall dating violence by addressing middle schoolers to educate them about relationships before they start dating in earnest.

headline.seo: Middle School Students Focus of Anti-Violence Effort
headline.main: A Warning to Teenagers Before They Start Dating
headline.print_headline: A Warning To Teenagers Before They Start Dating

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
